response: in germany, there is a high value for protecting personal information regarding data privacy. the european union has implemented the general data protection regulation (gdpr) in may 2018 which provides users with more control over their data. companies and organizations are required to ensure the security of all personal data that they collect and process. any violation of data protection laws can result in severe penalties, including fines up to 20 million euros or 4% of global annual turnover. it is important for social media platforms like twitter to take steps to protect their users' data by implementing strong security measures and transparent policies regarding data collection and use.<|endoftext|>
